pre_caption: The video uses a wide shot, capturing both the shoes and the suitcase in full view within the frame. Initially, the shoes are positioned near the bottom right of the frame in the foreground, while the blue suitcase sits further to the right, also in the foreground, with its open lid facing upward and some light-colored fabric visible inside. The background consists of a blue wall with white closet doors centered and an electrical outlet to the right. As the video progresses, the shoes move from their initial spot toward the suitcase, crossing the floor from the right side of the frame into the suitcase, which remains stationary. Once the shoes enter the suitcase, they are visible inside it, and the suitcase lid begins to close over them. Throughout the video, the camera remains at the same height as the shoes and suitcase, maintaining a straight-on, eye-level perspective without tilting or panning. The spatial relationship between the shoes and suitcase shifts from separated to combined, with the shoes transitioning from outside to inside the suitcase, while all elements remain in the foreground relative to the room’s depth.
